game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.

game.name: Zak McKracken and the Alien Mindbenders (256 - FM-TOWNS)
game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.
- Kanji version requires the FM-TOWNS Font ROM

game.name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
game.notes:
Game is completable
- Amiga, Atari ST, Mac and PC versions supported by this target
- Indiana may be able to walk in odd places, in some rooms
- No inventory controls in Mac version
- Atari ST and Mac versions require pcjr or pcspk music driver

game.name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (256)
game.notes: No known issues, game is completable.

game.name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (256 - FM-TOWNS)
game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.
- Kanji version requires the FM-TOWNS Font ROM

game.name: Loom
game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.
- Amiga, Atari ST, Mac and PC versions supported by this target
- No music or sound effects with Mac version
- Atari ST and Mac versions require pcjr or pcspk music driver
- MIDI support requires the Roland update from LucasArts

game.name: Loom (FM-TOWNS)
game.notes:
Game is completable
- Fades are seemingly different to other versions in some cases
- Text palette sometimes incorrect
- Distaff occasionally pink...
- Difficulty select is via boot param:
0 practice (default)
1 standard
2 expert
- Kanji version requires the FM-TOWNS Font ROM

game.name: The Secret of Monkey Island (EGA)
game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.
- Atari ST version requires pcjr or pcspk music driver
- MIDI support requires the Roland update from LucasArts

game.name: Passport to Adventure (Indy3, Monkey and Loom demos)
game.notes: All three demos are completable.

game.name: Loom (256 color CD version)
game.notes: No known issues, game is completable.

game.name: The Secret of Monkey Island (VGA Floppy)
game.notes:
Game is completable.
- Both Amiga (Use Amiga option) and PC versions supported by this target
- No music with Amiga version

game.name: The Secret of Monkey Island (VGA CD)
game.notes: No known issues, game is completable.

game.name: The Secret of Monkey Island (Alternative VGA CD)
game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.
- Both Mac and PC versions supported by this target

game.name: The Secret of Monkey Island (Sega CD)
game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.
- Dialogue choices can be selected with 6 (up) 7 (down) or mousewheel, with mouse button or number to select

game.name: Monkey Island 2: LeChuck's revenge
game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.
- Amiga, FM-TOWNS, Mac and PC versions supported by this target
- Kanji version requires the FM-TOWNS Font ROM

game.name: Monkey Island 2: LeChuck's revenge (DOS Demo)
game.notes:
Often crashes due to missing resources, since it was never meant to be playable
- No support for playing back the recorded file of gameplay

game.name: Indiana Jones 4 and the Fate of Atlantis
game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.
- Amiga, Mac and PC versions supported by this target
- Both disk and cd PC versions are supported by this target
- Music loud on some systems, run with -m30 to lower music volume.

game.name: Indiana Jones 4 and the Fate of Atlantis (FM-TOWNS)
game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.
- Music loud on some systems, run with -m30 to lower music volume.

game.name: Indiana Jones 4 and the Fate of Atlantis (Demo)
game.notes: No known issues, game is completable.

game.name: Day Of The Tentacle
game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.
- Both Mac and PC versions supported by this target
- Both disk and cd versions are supported by this target
- Maniac Mansion isn't playable on Ed's computer. To play the included copy, use 'Add Game' from the main ScummVM launcher and select the MANIAC directory inside the DOTT game directory

game.name: Day Of The Tentacle (Demo)
game.notes: No known issues, game is completable.

game.name: Simon The Sorcerer 2 (DOS)

game.name: Beneath a Steel Sky
game.notes:
Game is completable
- Floppy demos are unsupported
- Amiga versions aren't supported and probably never will be
There are also bugs which were already present in the original game and which we can't fix:
- The voice files for some sentences are missing.
This is especially noticeable in the court- and Mrs. Piermont sequence.
- The fonts for the LINC terminal are partially incorrect and the text sometimes passes the screen borders
- Special characters for french and italian subtitles are incorrect sometimes

game.name: Broken Sword I
game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.
- Only the PC version has been tested. We don't have any other versions, so we can't make any promises about them.

game.name: Broken Sword II
game.notes:
No known issues, game is completable.
- Only the PC version has been tested. We don't have any other versions, so we can't make any promises about them.

game.name: Flight of the Amazon Queen
game.notes:
Game should be completable.
- Some versions may require the queen.tbl resource file to be placed in the game directory. This is not required for the freeware releases
